FuncDef:
The display power slot command displays information about the rated power consumption of a device.
The display power slot slot-id command displays information about the rated power consumption of a specified board.
The display power slot detail command displays detailed information about the power consumption of each board.
The display power slot slot-id detail command displays detailed information about the power consumption of a specified board.
The display fan command displays fan status.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about the power consumption of a board in the specified slot.
The value is the slot number of the in-position board.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the power consumption of a device or boards during routine maintenance, run the display power slot command.
The fan status information includes the slot ID, in-position and registration status, working status, rotation speed, and rotation mode of a fan module.
